content.p: The arts and humanities explore humankind's past, where we are today and what the future might hold. Over 100 degrees across the spread of arts and humanities Recognising potential with a dedicated route into undergraduate study Build your knowledge and skills to the next level Develop your own research with our expert supervisors Study across the Faculty of Arts is informed by cutting-edge research and the knowledge and enthusiasm of its academic staff. Jonathan Tallant, Associate Pro-Vice Chancellor, Education and Student Experience For course and admissions enquiries see our enquiry page For Faculty contacts see our contacts page
